alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 2:10AM PST until February 25 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph causing blowing and drifting snow. Visibility will be reduced to one mile or less. * WHERE...Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
